generalInfo:
Explore the highlights of Slovakia on this unforgettable family Adventure! Begin in Bratislava, the country’s charming capital, before embarking on a scenic train ride to the stunning High Tatras – Slovakia’s Alps. Packed with great outdoor activities and incredible sights, this trip is the perfect mix of adventure, nature, and culture.

Why we think this trip is fantastic, and you’ll love it!

• Bratislava offers a delightful mix of history and charm, making it an ideal place for family discovery.
• Enjoy a scenic train ride to the High Tatras, an easy and scenic way to take in Slovakia's beautiful countryside.
• Take a cable car up to Skalnaté Pleso (1,754m), offering panoramic views of the majestic Lomnický Peak (2,634m).
• Hike through the High Tatras, exploring iconic mountain huts, crystal-clear lakes, and waterfalls.
• Raft and cycle through the Dunajec Gorge in Pieniny National Park, a natural border between Slovakia and Poland.
• Discover the grandeur of Spiš Castle, the largest UNESCO-listed castle in Central-Eastern Europe.
• Explore the UNESCO town of Levoca, known for its medieval charm and the world’s largest wooden altar.

This adventure blends outdoor thrills with cultural treasures, making it an ideal family trip. Ready to explore Slovakia? Let’s go!

dayInfo.description: Welcome to Bratislava, Slovakia! After arriving at Bratislava Airport, your family will enjoy a 20-minute transfer to your hotel in the heart of Bratislava’s charming Old Town. Once you’ve checked in and settled in, take some time to relax and get ready for the exciting adventures ahead! Meals included: No meals are included on this day. Overnight: Bratislava *Alternative Airport: Vienna

A Fun-Filled Family Day in Bratislava. Bratislava is a great place for a family day out! Start at Bratislava Castle, where you can enjoy amazing views, open spaces, and interesting exhibits. Then, walk through the Old Town, with its cobblestone streets, colourful buildings, and hidden courtyards. After a tasty lunch at a traditional restaurant, spend the afternoon exploring the city's many fun attractions at your own pace. Meals included: Breakfast Overnight: Bratislava

Train to the High Tatras, Slovakia´s greatest mountains and the oldest national park. Today, it's time to swap the city streets for mountain peaks as you travel to Slovakia’s greatest mountains – the High Tatras! Hop on a scenic train ride, a fun and comfortable way for the whole family to enjoy Slovakia’s countryside. In just over three and a half hours, you'll arrive in Poprad-Tatry, the gateway to the mountains. The High Tatras are like a real-life fairy tale—sparkling lakes, cascading waterfalls, colourful wildflowers, deep valleys, and towering peaks. This untouched paradise is also home to fascinating wildlife, so watch for eagles soaring above or marmots playing in the meadows! Once you reach Poprad, our friendly driver will be waiting to take you to your hotel in Smokovec, a charming mountain village in the heart of the Tatras. After checking in, take a relaxing family stroll to explore Smokovec and soak in the fresh alpine air. Your Tatras adventure starts here! Meals included: Breakfast Overnight: Smokovec

Cable car to Skalnate Pleso, then walk to mountain huts and waterfalls. This morning, take a scenic tram to Tatranska Lomnica and a cable car to Skalnate Pleso (1,751m), a crystal-clear mountain lake beneath Lomnicky Peak (2,634m). Hike a family-friendly trail through the Tatras, passing mountain huts and waterfalls. Enjoy lunch at Zamkovskeho hut, visit Cold Creek waterfalls, and explore Rainerova hut, the oldest in the Tatras. End the day with a funicular ride to Smokovec. Walking: 4,5hrs, 11km/6,8mi, 400m up, 400m down. Meals included: Breakfast, Packed Lunch Overnight: Smokovec

Raft, Hike & Bike: Explore Pieniny National Park. Start your day with an exhilarating 9 km rafting trip through the stunning 23km Dunajec Gorge, surrounded by towering cliffs and lush forests. Perfect for families, this adventure is even suitable for younger children! After a tasty lunch at a traditional restaurant, cycle along the scenic Dunajec River to the legendary Red Monastery. Discover its fascinating stories, including the tale of monk Cyprian, before returning to your hotel. Walking: 20 minutes, 1km/0,6mi, 0m up, 22m down Cycling: 1 hour, 8km/4,9mi, 73m up, 67m down Meals included: Breakfast Overnight: Smokovec

Tatra Tram to Strbske Pleso & Hike to Skok Waterfall. Hop on the Tatra tram to Štrbské Pleso, the highest village in Slovakia, passing through charming spa villages and enjoying stunning mountain views. From there, set off on a scenic hike to Skok Waterfall, a perfect family-friendly adventure surrounded by lush alpine meadows. Keep an eye out for Tatra chamois and other wildlife as you explore. Enjoy a picnic with breathtaking views before returning to Štrbské Pleso, where you can relax by the glacial lake before taking the tram. Walking: 3 Hours, 11km/7mi, 462m up, 462m down Meals included: Breakfast, Packed Lunch Overnight: Smokovec

Explore UNESCO sites: Spissky Castle & Levoca, then train to Bratislava. Today, we explore two of Slovakia’s most remarkable UNESCO sites: Spiš Castle and Levoca. Our adventure begins at Spiš Castle, Central-Eastern Europe’s largest castle complex. With breathtaking views and sprawling ruins, it’s the perfect place for kids to roam and imagine medieval life. Next, we visit Levoca, a beautifully preserved medieval town at the foothills of Slovak Paradise National Park. Surrounded by historic city walls, it boasts the Basilica of St. James, home to the world’s tallest wooden altar, and the elegant Town Hall. After exploring, we’ll enjoy lunch at a traditional medieval-style restaurant. In the afternoon, we board a scenic train from Poprad back to Bratislava. To end your journey on a high note, we recommend a farewell dinner at the UFO restaurant, where panoramic views of the Danube River and Old Town create the perfect final memory of Slovakia. Meals included: Breakfast Overnight: Bratislava

Transfer to airport . After an early breakfast, enjoy a short 20-minutes transfer back to Bratislava international airport to take your flight back home. Alternative airport: Vienna Meals included: Breakfast
